PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-03512014-04-03,  ,  EC,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the PCB Regulations and Repealing the Federal Mobile PCB Treatment and Destruction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PCB REGULATIONS AND REPEALING THE FEDERAL MOBILE PCB TREATMENT AND DESTRUCTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure the timely and orderly phase-out of high concentration electrical equipment with minimal disruptions to the power supply; (2) update the regulatory text and provide clarity to the regulated community while addressing inconsistencies identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations between English and French regulatory texts; and (3) repeal the Federal Mobile PCB Treatment and Destruction Regulations, which are no longer required.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0075 Publication Date: 2014-04-23
AttachmentsAttachment
